name: Blog Using Mongo DB
body:
This Blog Project was developed on the top of Spark java server
This will run as a stand alone java application which will internally invoke free marker for generating HTML templates  to user.
### Mongo DB is used for manipulating data in data base.

It is an umbrella project for a number of technology stacks which are involved::
 1.Java 
 2.Free Marker 
 3.Spark 4.Mongo DB(Database)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
